snippet: Markets await a deal between Greece and its eurozone creditors. | The F.T.C. is challenging Sysco’s takeover of US Foods. | Investors are on the hunt for the next proverbial so-called unicorn.
abstract: Markets await a deal between Greece and its eurozone creditors. | The F.T.C. is challenging Sysco’s takeover of US Foods. | Investors are on the hunt for the next proverbial so-called unicorn.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Markets Await Greek Deal
